text: "Behind These Hazel Eyes" is a hit single from 2005 by singer Kelly Clarkson from her 2004 album Breakaway. The song is about a relationship in which a man breaks a girl's heart and doesn't care how much he hurts her. Category:Pop rock songs Category:Kelly Clarkson songs Category:2005 songs Category:2000s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Rock ballads
title: Behind These Hazel Eyes
